Posts.Content: On 8/20/2008 Fightformom wrote: My friend was just recently diagnosed with breast cancer.  She found out today that she is at stage IV.  CT scan shows spot on her liver, but they are not saying that it is definately cancer on her liver too.  The cancer did spread to her bones and on her sternum.  What is the likely hood of her survival after chemo treatment.  Is this curable?  My friend too got the same problem. I have searched the internet for her and found some useful information. You should take a look on this site. http://www.freebreastcancerguide.com.
Posts.Title: Need Information
